title: The copye of the letter folowynge whiche specifyeth of ye greatest and meruelous uisyoned batayle that euer was sene or herde of and also of the letter yt was sent frome the great Turke vnto our holy fad[er] ye pope of Rome
author: Clere-Ville, Bartholomé de.
publicationPlace: [Emprented in ye famous cite of Andwarpe :
